title: Cold Case Chase
description: A woman falsely accused. A lawman out for justice. Sergeant Anthony Jones never expected the most challenging fugitive he’d ever have to track down would be his childhood sweetheart, Tessa Watson. She’s accused of a cold case murder, but she claims she’s being framed for a crime she didn’t commit. Now Tessa wants Anthony’s help to clear her name. But the clock is ticking, because armed assailants will do anything to keep them from uncovering long-buried secrets.From Love Inspired Courage. Danger. Faith.
author: Maggie K. Black
